Six of Britains biggest banks agreed to offer mortgages on buildings with fire safety defects, freeing owners trapped in previously unsellable homes.

articles.title: Why your home is about to cost you £57000 more - The Telegraph
articles.description: Rising mortgage rates mean the interest you pay on the same property will soar
